org.intellimate.izou.util

Interface AddonThreadPoolUser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MainProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivatorManager, AddOnManager, EventDistributor, OutputManager, ResourceManager, SoundManager

    public interface AddonThreadPoolUser
extends MainProvider
    ALWAYS implement this interface when you have to put some Tasks into the ThreadPool
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leander Kurscheidt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default CompletableFuture<Void> submit(Runnable runnable)
      submits the Runnable to the AddOns Thread-Pool

      submits the Supplier to the AddOns Thread-Pool
      default <U,V extends Future<U>>
      List<V>      		 timeOut(Collection<? extends V> futures, int milliseconds)

        submits the Runnable to the AddOns Thread-Pool

      • timeOut

        default <U,V extends Future<U>> List<V> timeOut(Collection<? extends V> futures,
                                                int milliseconds)
                                         throws InterruptedException
        times out the collection of futures
        Type Parameters:
        U - the return type of the futures
        V - the type of the futures
        Parameters:
        futures - the collection of futures
        milliseconds - the limit in milliseconds (everything under 20 milliseconds makes no sense)
        Returns:
        a List of futures
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the process was interrupted
